title: Textile, 1851–63
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and/or block printed on plain weave; glazed
description: Three pieces, same design, different colors. A) Ground printed, probably by "molette," in two shades of grey in minute zig-zags; darker shade forming trellis pattern. Small flower clusters in rose with green foliage and shadowy grey foliage, printed within trellis, probably by block. B) Same design but ground slightly blue-grey. C) Same design but ground in yellow. Glazed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1851–63.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and/or block printed on plain weave; glazed. 1967-10-2-a.
